  Property '[_sym]' does not exist on type 'MyClass'.

  Property '[_sym]' does not exist on type 'MyClass'.


==== lateBoundClassMemberAssignmentJS.js (3 errors) ====
    const _sym = Symbol("_sym");
    export class MyClass {
        constructor() {
            this[_sym] = "ok";
            ~~~~~~~~~~

            this[_sym] = "yep";
            ~~~~~~~~~~
